TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ConcurrencyMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定服務類別是支援單一執行緒或多重執行緒的作業模式。

span.span: Specifies whether a service class supports single-threaded or multi-threaded modes of operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 與 屬性搭配使用，指定服務類別是支援單一執行緒或多重執行緒的作業模式。 is used in conjunction with the property to specify whether a service class supports single-threaded or multi-threaded modes of operation. 單一執行緒作業可為可重新進入 (Reentrant) 或不可重新進入 (Non-Reentrant)。A single-threaded operation can be either reentrant or non-reentrant. 下表顯示當 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 會允許作業，以叫用另一個正在進行中，同時根據。The following table shows when Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) permits an operation to be invoked while another one is in progress, depending upon the . |ConcurrencyMode 值ConcurrencyMode Value|新作業可叫用嗎？Can a new operation be invoked?| |---------------------------|-------------------------------------| |SingleSingle|永不。Never.| |可重新進入Reentrant|只在叫用另一服務或回呼時。Only while invoking another service or a callback.| |選擇性顯示Multiple|永遠。Always.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用單一、 可重新進入和多個之間的差異。The following code example demonstrates the different between using Single, Reentrant, and Multiple. 此範例不會編譯而不需要實際的實作，其項目，後面，但並未示範執行緒保證，WCF 會，這表示您的作業程式碼的類型。This sample does not compile without a real implementation behind it, but does demonstrate the kind of threading guarantees that WCF makes and what that means for your operation code. [!code-csharp[C_BestPractices-Concurrency#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_bestpractices-concurrency/cs/reentrantandmultiple.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode Multiple = int32(2)

summary.span: 服務執行個體為多執行緒。
由於其他執行緒可隨時變更您的服務物件，您必須隨時處理同步及狀態的一致性。

span.span: Because other threads can change your service object at any time, you must handle synchronization and state consistency at all times.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode Reentrant = int32(1)

summary.span: 服務執行個體為單一執行緒，且接受重新進入呼叫。

span.span: The service instance is single-threaded and accepts reentrant calls.

summary.span: 重新進入服務在您呼叫其他服務時接受呼叫；因此您的責任是在 Callout 前保持物件狀態一致性，並且必須確定作業本機資料在 Callout 後有效。

span.span: The reentrant service accepts calls when you call another service; it is therefore your responsibility to leave your object state consistent before callouts and you must confirm that operation-local data is valid after callouts.

summary.span: 請注意，只有透過 WCF 通道呼叫另一個服務才能解除服務執行個體鎖定。

span.span: Note that the service instance is unlocked only by calling another service over a WCF channel.

summary.span: 此時，被呼叫的服務可透過回呼重新進入第一個服務。

span.span: In this case, the called service can reenter the first service via a callback.

summary.span: 如果第一個服務無法重新進入，這時的呼叫順序會造成死結。

span.span: If the first service is not reentrant, the sequence of calls results in a deadlock.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode Single = int32(0)

summary.span: 該服務執行個體為單一執行緒服務，而且不接受重新進入 (Reentrant) 的呼叫。

span.span: The service instance is single-threaded and does not accept reentrant calls.

summary.span: 若 屬性為 ，而且在執行個體處理呼叫時有另外的訊息抵達，這些訊息必須等到服務可使用，或者訊息逾時為止。

span.span: If the property is , and additional messages arrive while the instance services a call, these messages must wait until the service is available or until the messages time out.
